/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
